title: 关于自定义NPC添加BGM
author: cloud_dream
txt_content: 我把自定义NPC的OGG音乐放入了指定位置，改了配置文件，但是代码写好后能使用的，只有一首音乐能够播放，其它音乐虽然能选，但是没声，求大神指教

replies.txt_content:
cloud_dream 发表于 2016-9-10 17:49
试过了，不行的{
"1-1": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/1","stream": true}]},
"1-2": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/2","stream": true}]},
"1-3": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/3","stream": true}]},
"1-4": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/4","stream": true}]},
"1-5": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/5","stream": true}]},
"1-5": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/6","stream": true}]},
"1-5": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/7","stream": true}]},
"1-5": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/8","stream": true}]},
"1-5": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/9","stream": true}]},
"1-6": {"sounds": [{"name": "zasq/0","stream": true}]}
}
复制代码
试试这个声音文本
zasq指.minecraft\customnpcs\assets\customnpcs\里的zasq文件夹
0-9是音乐
